titleInfo.title: Shinohara pops! the avant-garde road, Tokyo/New York

originInfo.publisher: distributed by State University of New York Press

mods.note: "This publication accompanies the exhibition Shinohara Pops! The Avant-Garde Road, Tokyo/New York, curated by Hiroko Ikegami and Reiko Tomii and presented at the Sara Bedrick Gallery of the Samuel Dorsky Museum of Art at the State University of New York at New Paltz, from August 29 through December 16, 2012"--T.p. verso
mods.abstract: Content: Shinohara pops! When Oiran rides a motorcycle, Wonder Woman swings a samurai sword / Hiroko Ikegami -- Ushio Shinohara's action in three modes : Boxing painting and beyond / Reiko Tomii -- Art of the motorcycle : Shinohara in the 1970s / Michael Lobel -- Shinohara speaks! / selected by Hiroko Ikegami, translated by Reiko Tomii.
